sentences.sentence: He was much weakened constitutionally by the disease.
sentences.translation: 那场病使得他体质大大减弱。

sentences.sentence: The technique consists of injecting healthy cells into the weakened muscles.
sentences.translation: 这项技术包括把健康细胞注射进衰弱的肌肉里。

sentences.sentence: The recession has weakened so many businesses that many can no longer survive.
sentences.translation: 经济衰退削弱了很多企业的实力，以至于很多无法再生存下去。
